篮球礼物游戏规则
    新用户有一局免费试玩机会（30s），试玩不扣
 除金币且所得积分不计入排行榜
1.每次投篮主播会收到一个篮球礼物，连续送出
   会有炫酷礼物动效
2.每局30s，拿起篮球后向上滑动抛出篮球会按照
   滑动的抛物线方向抛出，成功抛出一球后开始计
   时
3.点击拿起篮球后在地板区域松手放下视为取消投
   球
4.当您累计投中5个球时触发篮筐左右移动效果,如
   连续5球未投进将停止移动
5.进球计分规则
空心进球：固定篮筐计分:3分，移动篮筐计分:4分
砸框进球：固定篮筐计分:2分，移动篮筐计分:3分
6.计分翻倍说明
   初始X1，每投进一个空心球，投进的篮球会触发
   火焰效果，使用带有火焰的球投进空心球，触发
   翻倍效果，每进一个火焰空心球倍数加1，最多
   倍数X5，如翻倍后连续未投进3球，翻倍效果直
   接降至初始X1状态
7.开始游戏后，主播侧会触发助威贴纸特效，为你
   专属打call！
注意事项：
1.需升级至最新版本
2.网络不稳定会导致部分积分无法计入
3.为了良好的游戏体验，如发现用户存在违规行为，
   我们将清空用户游戏积分，收回奖品，同时依照
   社区规范进行处罚

Instructions
Basketball Game:
New players have one free trial (30s), which 
doesn't cost coins. Points won in the free trial
are not counted.
1. For each throw, one basketball gift will be 
    sent to the broadcaster. Throw the ball 
    consecutively with very short breaks to 
    trigger a cool gifting effect.
2. Each round lasts for 30s. Tap on the ball,
    swipe up and release to throw it out. 
    Countdown starts as you successfully 
    throw out a ball.
3. To cancel throwing, you can release the ball on 
    the ground after taking it.
4. After 5 successful shots, the basket will start 
    moving horizonally and will stop moving after 
    you fail 5 throws consecutively. 
5. Scoring Rules
Clean Shot
  Fixed Basket: 3 points   Moving Basket: 4 points
Bank Shot
  Fixed Basket: 2 points   Moving Basket: 3 points
6. Points Multiplier
   Every time you have a clean shot, flaming 
   basketball will be triggered. After giving a 
   clean shot with a flaming basketball, multiplier 
   is triggered. 
For each flaming clean shot, multiplier increases
by 
1. Multiplier limit is 5. 
3 consecutive failures after the multiplier is 
   triggered will directly reduce the multiplier to 1.
7. During the game, the broadcaster will put on the 
    exclusive sticker to cheer for you!
Note:
1. Please update to the latest version first.
2. Poor network connection may lead to missing 
     points.
3. In case of any rule-violating behaviors, we will
    clear the user's score, withdraw the rewards 
    and get the user punished in accordance with
    the community rules.

For each flaming clean shot, multiplier increases by
